divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a parking lot of a movie theater with my wife. While I was walking to the movie theater, I saw two very bright light in the sky. Of course one was the sun, then what was the other? So I took out my phone and took a picture of that.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Everett
There were no other sightings in Everett on or around June 27th 2012
Summary: it seemed like there were two suns in the sky.
